name: pictureMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the picture mode of a TV.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the picture mode.

parameters.name: predefinedPictureMode
parameters.description: The predefined picture mode to set (e.g., Standard, Dynamic, Natural, Movie).
